about_the_game:
School Girl Simulator game has two players in a high-security school - a fragile and brash student against a strict and fierce teacher. The student's task is to find a way to pass the exams and not be caught, while the teacher has to catch her and punish her.

The game takes place in a high school of strict security. The teacher is a keeper and is supposed to control the student that she would not break the rules and pass all the exams.



The student must any available ways to cheat on the exam. Her friends have left her cheats all over the school and she needs to find them all and not to be seen by the teacher.



  • The student can pick up and throw various objects to slow down the teacher
  • The teacher has a pointer, a gas cannon and a taser to slow down the intruder

name: School Girl Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD A10-7850K
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: School Girl Simulator game has two players in a high-security school - a fragile and brash student against a strict and fierce teacher. The student's task is to find a way to pass the exams and not be caught, while the teacher has to catch her and punish her.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
